topic.title: Multiple Rendering Modes for the Same Author Document

section.title: Question
section.p: How can we add multiple buttons, each showing different visualisation mode of the same Author document (by associating additional/different CSS style sheet)?

section.title: Answer
section.p: In the toolbar of the Author mode there is a drop-down button which contains alternative CSS styles for the same document. To add an alternative CSS stylesheet go to Preferences->Document Type Association page, select the document type associated with your documents and press Edit. In the Document Type dialog that appears go to "Author" tab, "CSS" tab and add there references to alternate CSS stylesheets.

For example, one of the alternate CSSs that we offer for DITA document type is located here: OXYGEN_INSTALL_DIR/frameworks/dita/css_classed/hideColspec.cssIf you open it, you will see that it imports the main CSS and then adds selectors of its own.
